thread.title: Pence remains above the fray, but is he outside the inner circle?
thread.title_full: Pence remains above the fray, but is he outside the inner circle?

posts.title: Pence remains above the fray, but is he outside the inner circle?
posts.text:
Pence remains above the fray, but is he outside the inner circle? The inside track on Washington politics. Be the first to know about new stories from PowerPost. Sign up to follow, and we‚Äôll e-mail you free updates as they‚Äôre published. You‚Äôll receive free e-mail news updates each time a new story is published. You‚Äôre all set! Got it (Jason Aldag/The Washington Post) By Robert Costa and Ashley Parker By Robert Costa and Ashley Parker February 14 at 9:10 PM Follow @costareports Follow @ashleyrparker 
For nearly two full weeks, nobody told Vice President Pence that he had been misled by national security adviser Michael Flynn. 
After privately being assured by Flynn that he had never had any discussions about Russian sanctions with that country‚Äôs ambassador, Pence went on TV in mid-January and publicly parroted Flynn‚Äôs denial. But on Jan. 26, President Trump and a small group of senior aides learned that the Justice Department had evidence that Flynn had, in fact, discussed sanctions and misled the vice president. 
Yet it would take almost a fortnight for Pence to learn the truth ‚Äî and only then because of a report in The Washington Post, according to Marc Lotter, a spokesman for the vice president. 
Throughout the campaign and now in office, Pence has largely managed to avoid the infighting and warring factions of the young White House by keeping his head down and soldiering loyally forward. But the incident with Flynn reveals both the benefits and risks of his approach ‚Äî he has emerged largely unharmed by the scandal that led to Flynn‚Äôs resignation, but his influence within the West Wing has come increasingly into question given how little he knew about his own situation. 
‚ÄúDoes this episode strengthen Pence or weaken Pence?‚Äù asked William Kristol, editor at large of the Weekly Standard, a conservative magazine and who served as chief of staff to Vice President Dan Quayle. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs what everybody is trying to figure out.‚Äù (The Washington Post) 
Pence‚Äôs decision to try to stay out of the cliques that have plagued the White House has allowed him, so far, to maintain his standing as a neutral player committed to forwarding Trump‚Äôs agenda on Capitol Hill. But it also appears to have left him at times outside the inner circle of Trump‚Äôs brain trust. Aides to both the president and vice president say the two men speak on the phone or in person multiple times a day. But despite their frequent communication, the president never told his No. 2 that he had been misled by Flynn ‚Äî and that in defending him on the Sunday shows had put himself in a publicly compromising and embarrassing situation. 
‚ÄúThe vice president became aware of incomplete information that he had received on Feb. 9, last Thursday night, based on media accounts,‚Äù Lotter told reporters Tuesday. ‚ÄúHe did an inquiry based on those media accounts.‚Äù 
Several people close to him were more blunt, saying he was ‚Äúblindsided‚Äù and ‚Äúfrustrated.‚Äù 
But even as Flynn flailed, Pence did not urge Trump to fire him, or lash out against him. Instead, said two officials familiar with the situation, Pence was disappointed and suggested that Flynn could publicly apologize. Others within the White House, however, thought what Flynn had done was egregious and unacceptable. 
‚ÄúThe vice president is a very forgiving man,‚Äù said one White House official. On Friday, Pence, chief of staff Reince Priebus and White House counsel Don McGahn held a conference call with Flynn ‚Äî who had originally denied any improper communications with the Russian envoy ‚Äî to go over his story again, according to two officials familiar with the call. Flynn was at Mar-a-Lago, Trump‚Äôs private club in Palm Beach, Fla., during the call, while the other three men were in Washington. Pence left the conversation troubled, as did Priebus, who expressed dismay both with Flynn‚Äôs answers and the dawning reality that Flynn had deceived Pence. 
By Monday, Pence was in full agreement with Priebus and others that it would be best for Flynn to go and remained involved in all top-level talks that day. 
Asked how the vice president could be kept in the dark about the Flynn controversy for so long, two White House officials said it was a result of the muddled and uncertain way events unfolded rather than an intentional desire to keep him out of the loop. 
On Jan. 26, when acting attorney general Sally Yates contacted McGahn about discrepancies of Flynn‚Äôs account of his conversations with the Russian ambassador to the United States, McGahn took the information directly to Trump in the Oval Office that day. Trump quickly brought in chief strategist Stephen K. Bannon and Priebus to join the discussion with McGahn, said two White House officials, who were not authorized to speak publicly. 
McGahn then conferred with Yates again the following day to try to glean more information about what Yates knew and to probe the matter further. 
But McGahn, who has been friends with Pence since the vice president was a House member, did not share the information beyond that group because he had already informed the president and his top two advisers, with the expectation that anyone else who needed to know would be informed by those principals. 
Several other sources within the White House described the situation as ‚Äúunfortunate‚Äù and ‚Äúunintended,‚Äù saying that Trump and McGahn did not mean to exclude Pence but were reacting to Yates ‚Äî whose information was initially viewed with some skepticism ‚Äî and trying to keep the information about Flynn within a tight group. At that point, Flynn was still maintaining that he had discussed nothing improper with the Russian ambassador. 
Nonetheless, the two week lag between when Trump, Bannon and Priebus learned of Flynn‚Äôs misdirection and when Pence himself found out through news reports has raised speculation as to Pence‚Äôs true clout ‚Äî or lack thereof ‚Äî within the White House. In 2010, when Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal, President Barack Obama‚Äôs military chief in Afghanistan, made disparaging remarks about some of Obama‚Äôs senior civilian advisers, including Vice President Joe Biden, Obama‚Äôs response was swift and decisive. Within 40 hours, he called McChrystal back to Washington and fired him. 
Pence is not the type to demand that sort of response. Those who know him said he is thinking ahead, believing that as vice president, he is likely to outlast advisers whose positions may be more tenuous. ‚ÄúPence is trying to play a long game, keeping his head down and keeping his powder dry, assuming some of the more flamboyant types will blow up or blow out and he will be there as a trusted counselor a year or so from now,‚Äù Kristol said. But, he added, ‚ÄúThe long game can mislead you. If you end up keeping your powder dry and never using it, you end up being just another guy in the White House.‚Äù 
A Republican who works closely with Hill lawmakers said that Pence has repeatedly gone to the Capitol to assuage fears, only to have his reassuring words upended by a tweet from Trump and upheaval within the West Wing. The question that legislators are trying to figure out, that Republican said, is if Pence ‚Äî like most everyone else ‚Äî is simply a victim to a rash and erratic president, or if he is deliberately being shut out by senior White House advisers. 
The latest incident with Flynn, he added, further undermines the vice president. ‚ÄúThis is hurtful to Pence,‚Äù he said, speaking anonymously to offer a candid insight. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs another example of him not being totally in the loop.‚Äù Pence, however, is still well-liked by lawmakers, many of whom view him as their most direct line into the White House and their best hope for enacting a conservative, Republican agenda. And they remain hopefully optimistic that he is a pivotal West Wing player . 
‚ÄúI think Pence has a lot of respect by the president and by a lot of us who have known him,‚Äù said Sen. Richard C. Shelby (R-Ala.). ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs solid, he‚Äôs measured, and he fits the job beautifully.‚Äù 
Sen. Roy Blunt (R-Mo.) said that Pence‚Äôs influence within the White House was evident simply from Flynn‚Äôs downfall. ‚ÄúAs it turned out, misleading the vice president doesn‚Äôt look like it was a very good thing to do.‚Äù 
Jenna Johnson, Abby Phillip and Sean Sullivan contributed to this report. politics News and analysis on the deadliest day for police since 9/11. post_newsletter353

posts.text:
Captan a AMLO acosando a la famosa paloma de Facebook que sale en los comentarios Omar Ariel Cort√©s / SDPnoticias.com lun 13 feb 2017 19:37 Pajito a pajito Foto propiedad de: Internet 
M√©xico.- Gran sorpresa causaron un grupo de reporteros al presentar un v√≠deo y fotograf√≠as en donde se aprecia al candidato a la presidencia del 2018 y 2024, Andr√©s Manuel L√≥pez Obrador, acosando a la famosa paloma de Facebook que est√° invadiendo todos los comentarios. 
Los periodistas se√±alan que por alguna extra√±a raz√≥n ‚ÄúAMLO tiene una enfermiza obsesi√≥n por molestar palomas‚Äù ya que no es la primera vez que se le ve persiguiendo a estos animales. 
Los investigadores incluso mencionan ‚Äúque existen altas posibilidades de que la paloma de Facebook sea la misma que hace meses Obrador acos√≥ en un callej√≥n de Guanajuato‚Äù, mencionando que el ave podr√≠a haber firmado para aparecer en la red social tras dicho incidente: 
‚ÄúContamos con informantes que aseguran que Mark Zuckerberg se fij√≥ en la paloma de Facebook cuando vio el video de Andr√©s molest√°ndola. √âl se dio cuenta del esc√°ndalo que hizo, y posteriormente la contact√≥ para que apareciera como imagen en los comentarios. Por supuesto le hizo un cambio de look, le aclar√≥ un poco las plumas y la mand√≥ al sal√≥n de belleza. 
Sea o no sea la misma paloma, lo cierto esque L√≥pez tiene una extra√±a obsesi√≥n por perseguir palomas, incluso Greenpeace ya interpuso una demanda contra el eterno presidenciable porque son decenas las palomas que atestiguan haber sido perseguidas por este se√±or‚Äù, se√±alaron. 
Los informantes comentan que cuando Manuel vio que la simp√°tica paloma de Facebook se hab√≠a vuelto viral, inmediatamente movi√≥ sus influencias para dar con ella y conocerla en vivo: 
Cuando vio que todo el mundo estaba posteando la paloma qued√≥ fascinado y r√°pidamente movi√≥ sus influencias para localizarla. 
Obrador estuvo cerca de 2 horas afuera de la fuente donde le indicaron que la ahora famosa paloma iba a descansar y comer ma√≠z por la tarde, y cuando la vio se acerc√≥ y comenz√≥ a perseguirla. 
Obrador no sabe que tal vez es la misma paloma que hace meses molest√≥ en Guanajuato, aun as√≠, si no acosa a esta paloma est√° dispuesto a perseguir a otras. Todas tienen miedo de encontr√°rselo y que las capture para encerrarlas o les haga algo peor, no es normal el capricho que tiene con ellas‚Äù, puntualizaron. Aviso: Los comentarios vertidos en la secci√≥n "Pitorreo" de SDPnoticias, son divulgados con el objeto de informar en forma humor√≠stica sobre temas figurados provenientes de noticias o acontecimientos nacionales o internacionales donde la ficci√≥n se mezcla con el humor en aras de preservar lo previsto en los art√≠culos 6¬∫ y 133 de la Constituci√≥n Federal mexicana y en las cl√°usulas 18 y 19 de la Declaraci√≥n Universal de los Derechos Humanos, as√≠ como en lo dispuesto por el numeral 13 del Pacto de San Jos√©; por ende, la secci√≥n "Pitorreo" respeta la libertad arm√≥nica de quienes hacen uso de su derecho a la opini√≥n humor√≠stica con el af√°n de generar esparcimiento en la divulgaci√≥n de contenidos figurados o casos hipot√©ticos, cuya responsabilidad exclusiva proviene del autor de la nota o informaci√≥n p√∫blica que se brinda, consolidando SDPnoticias su car√°cter esencial de medio facilitador de la libertad de expresi√≥n, del derecho a la informaci√≥n y el esparcimiento. Las controversias que se susciten con motivo de lo divulgado en esta secci√≥n y los sujetos con inter√©s leg√≠timo en solicitar alg√∫n tipo de intervenci√≥n, ser√°n de la competencia de nuestro Ombudsman. thread.title: Venezuelan president says he wants CNN out of country just days after report on passports, visas being sold in Iraq
thread.title_full: Venezuelan president says he wants CNN out of country just days after report on passports, visas being sold in Iraq

posts.title: Venezuelan president says he wants CNN out of country just days after report on passports, visas being sold in Iraq
posts.text:
Venezuelan president says he wants CNN out of country just days after report on passports, visas being sold in Iraq Published February 13, 2017   livefyre Email Print 
Venezuela's president Nicolas Maduro. (AP) 
Venezuela‚Äôs President Nicolas Maduro said on Sunday he wanted CNN out of the country, alleging it misrepresents the truth and meddles in issues that are not of their concern. 
"CNN, do not get into the affairs of Venezuelans. I want CNN well away from here. Outside of Venezuela. Do not put your nose in Venezuela," said Maduro during a political act. 
He made the comment after blaming the U.S. network of distorting the facts when reporting on irregularities at a Caracas public high school. "Some media like CNN tried to manipulate. They cannot manipulate! That is our business, of the Venezuelans," he said. 
VENEZUELA NOW LEADS US ASYLUM REQUESTS AS CRISIS DEEPENS 
The threat also came a few days after CNN en Espanol broadcast and posted online an in-depth investigation into how officials of the Venezuelan Embassy in Iraq allegedly sold Venezuelan passports and visas to suspected terrorists. 
‚ÄúPassports in the Shadows‚Äù was the result of a yearlong investigation showcasing an account by a whistleblower, a former legal adviser to the Venezuelan embassy in Baghdad, and the government officials‚Äô dismissal of the allegations. 
VENEZUELANS KILLING FLAMINGOS AND ANTEATERS TO STAVE OFF HUNGER AMID MOUNTING FOOD CRISIS 
Earlier on Sunday, Venezuelan police arrested and expelled two Brazilian reporters after they toured a structure built in 2012 by Odebrecht, the Brazilian company being investigated for a vast corruption scheme that allegedly touches several Latin American governments and heads of state. posts.title: Drake's New Chain Cost More Than Most People Earn In A Year
posts.text:
Drake's New Chain Cost More Than Most People Earn In A Year February 13, 2017 | 7:14 AM 11 
A video has emerged of Drake trying on his new chain and it‚Äôs the kind of thing that a pirate‚Äôs dreams are made of. 
The chain, made by jeweler to the stars Ben Baller, was delivered to Drake in Manchester as he continues his tour of the United Kingdom, and the Canadian rapper looked bloody well chuffed with the new piece, as the Brits would say. 
According to TMZ , the chain is made from almost a kilo of gold and is adorned with black, green and yellow diamonds. The video that Ben Baller shared to his Instagram shows the chain sparkling as it‚Äôs removed from its packaging. It didn‚Äôt come cheap, though, TMZ has reported that the chain cost around $100,000. 
Baller also shared some reflections on his history with Drizzy. 
‚ÄúI met @champagnepapi at the Apple Store in the Beverly center in 2008. From that day on I fucked with The Boy heavy. I was picking him up from the airport, getting him cars, trees and showing him my city like a real big homie does. #SoFarGone dropped and shit hit the fan. Then #ThankMeLater , then #TakeCare and He would take me on tour to be apart of the show giving out chains to random girls in the audience. One time at a sold out show in San Jose, Drake forgot where we were because he screamed out ‚ÄòLA what‚Äôs good???!!!!'‚Äù 
‚ÄúAnd that Bay Area crowd boo‚Äôd ?LOUD?. It felt like that southwest commercial, Wanna get away? I back stepped off that stage dumb fast ? In 2012 I started my family and he became the biggest superstar in the ? and we lost communication‚Ä¶ So 9 years later were here in Manchester U.K. to finally have our full circle moment. More life and more jewels to come bro.‚Äù A video posted by Ben Baller üá∞üá∑ (@benballer) on Feb 11, 2017 at 11:26am PST 
Drake shared some shots of him in the chain, as well as a CeeLo at the Grammys -inspired meme. thread.title: Arter explains Pep embrace
thread.title_full: Arter explains Pep embrace

posts.title: Arter explains Pep embrace
posts.text:
Pep Guardiola wishes Harry Arter luck with partner's pregnancy Last Updated: 14/02/17 10:43am Pep Guardiola wished Harry Arter luck with his partner's pregnancy Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola made a point of seeking out Bournemouth's Harry Arter after Monday's 2-0 win to wish him luck for his partner's pregnancy. 
The midfielder and partner Rachel suffered heartbreak in December 2015 when their daughter was stillborn. 
They are now expecting another child, and Guardiola sought Arter out on the pitch at the final whistle of the Monday Night Football clash at the Vitality Stadium to wish the Republic of Ireland international the best of luck. ƒë¬ü¬ë¬è From Pep to @HarryArter2 , a touch of class..."He gave me and my partner his best wishes ahead of the birth of our child." #afcb ƒë¬ü¬ç¬í pic.twitter.com/BEu0MaRbBK ‚Äî AFC Bournemouth ƒë¬ü¬ç¬í (@afcbournemouth) February 13, 2017 
"He offered his best wishes for me and my partner this week, which was an unbelievable touch," Arter told the Daily Echo . 
"He is someone I have a massive amount of respect for. I watched his Barcelona teams - and look at his Manchester City side tonight‚Ä¶ Bournemouth 0-2 Man City 
"For me, he is the best manager in the world. I don't think there's anybody close to him and what he has achieved. 
"For him to offer that to me, I respected it and accepted it with a smile on my face." 
Guardiola said: "He will be a father soon so I said big congratulations to him and his partner because I know what happened in the past, and, hopefully, the baby will be well." Also See:

‰ªñÂÄëÂè™ÊòØÂú®ÊäíÁôºËá™Â∑±Â∞çÂ®ÅÊ¨äÊôÇ‰ª£ÁöÑÈÑâÊÑÅÔºö‰ª•ÂâçÈÇ£Ê®£Â§öÁæéÂ•ΩÔºÅ‰∏ñÁïåÂ¶ÇÊ≠§ÂñÆÁ¥îÔºåÂ≠∏Ê†°Âè™Áµ¶‰∏ÄÂ•óÊ®ôÊ∫ñÁ≠îÊ°àÔºåÊîøÂ∫úË™™‰ªÄÈ∫ºÂ∞±ÊòØ‰ªÄÈ∫ºÔºåÁÇ∫‰ªÄÈ∫ºË¶Å„ÄåÂº∑Ëø´„ÄçÊàëÂÄëÁöÑÂ≠©Â≠êÊàêÁÇ∫‰∏ÄÂÄãÊúÉÊÄùËÄÉÁöÑËá™Áî±‰∫∫Ôºü ‰∏çÁî®Êúâ‰ªÄÈ∫ºÈ´òÊ∑±ÁöÑÊïôËÇ≤Â≠∏Á¥†È§äÔºåÂè™Ë¶ÅÈö®‰æøÂà∞Âì™ÂÄã„ÄåÊ•≠Áïå„ÄçÂéªÂïè‰∏ÄÂúàÔºå‰ªñÂÄëÈÉΩÊúÉÂëäË®¥‰Ω†Ôºå‰ºÅÊ•≠ÊúüÂæÖÂ≠∏Ê†°Áî¢Âá∫ÁöÑÊòØÂÖ∑Êúâ„ÄåÁôºÁèæÂïèÈ°å„ÄÅËß£Ê±∫ÂïèÈ°å„ÄçËÉΩÂäõÁöÑÂ≠∏Áîü„ÄÇËÄåËÅØËÄÉÊôÇ‰ª£ÁöÑÊïôËÇ≤ÊÅ∞ÊÅ∞Â∞±ÊòØÊúÄÂÆ≥ÊÄïÂ≠∏ÁîüÊúâËÉΩÂäõÁôºÁèæÂïèÈ°å„ÄÅËß£Ê±∫ÂïèÈ°åÔºåÂõ†ÁÇ∫Ê≤íÊúâ‰ªÄÈ∫ºÊØîÂ®ÅÊ¨äÈ´îÂà∂Êõ¥ËÉΩÈÄ†ÊàêÊïàÁéá‰Ωé‰∏ãËàáÁÑ°ÊÑèÁæ©ÁöÑÂπªË±°‰∫ÜÔºåÂÆÉËá™Â∑±Â∞±ÊòØÊúÄÂ§ßÁöÑÂïèÈ°å„ÄÇÊàëÂÄëÂ∞±ÁÆó‰∏çËÄÉÊÖÆÂ≠∏Èô¢Ë£°ÁöÑÊïôËÇ≤ÁêÜÊÉ≥ÊÄßÔºåÂÖâÊòØÊØîÂ∞çÂïÜÁÆ°Ë≤°Á∂ìÊõ∏Á±çÊâÄË¶ÅÊ±ÇÁöÑ„Äå‰∫∫Êâç„ÄçÔºåËàáÂÇ≥Áµ±ÊïôËÇ≤È´îÂà∂ÊâÄÊèê‰æõÁöÑË®ìÁ∑¥ÂÖßÂÆπÔºåÂÖ∂ËêΩÂ∑ÆÂ∞±‰∏çÂèØ‰ª•ÈÅìÈáåË®à„ÄÇ Partager Reuters Une enqu√™te pr√©liminaire pour suspicion de fraude fiscale a √©t√© ouverte √† l‚Äôencontre du porte-parole du candidat de la droite Thierry Sol√®re. Une information r√©v√©l√©e par le Canard encha√Æn√© √† para√Ætre mercredi. A chaque mercredi son lot de nouvelles r√©v√©lations contre Fran√ßois Fillon et son entourage. Selon Reuters, une enqu√™te pr√©liminaire pour suspicion de fraude fiscale a √©t√© lanc√©e par le parquet de Nanterre (Hauts-de-Seine) √† l‚Äôencontre de Thierry Sol√®re, porte-parole du candidat de la droite √† la pr√©sidentielle Fran√ßois Fillon, confirmant une information du Canard encha√Æn√© √† para√Ætre mercredi. La Une du 15 f√©vrier 2017 est √† consulter ici : https://t.co/iCPnb2rBBz 
‚Äî @canardenchaine (@canardenchaine) February 14, 2017 L‚Äôenqu√™te a √©t√© ouverte le 6 septembre 2016 √† la suite d‚Äôune d√©nonciation des services fiscaux, selon Reuters. Elle porterait sur les ann√©es 2010 √† 2013. Thierry Sol√®re a annonc√© son intention de porter plainte en diffamation contre le Canard encha√Æn√©, affirmant avoir toujours d√©clar√© ses revenus et √™tre actuellement √† jour de ses imp√¥ts. Grand ordonnateur de la primaire de la droite et du centre, le d√©put√© fait partie comme Fran√ßois Fillon des parlementaires salariant leur √©pouse, affirme l‚Äôhebdomadaire satirique, √† para√Ætre mercredi. Mais l‚Äôenqu√™te ordonn√©e par le parquet fait suite, elle, √† un contr√¥le fiscal ayant √©tabli qu‚Äôil avait omis de r√©gler une partie de ses imp√¥ts sur le revenu de 2010 √† 2013, ainsi que la taxe fonci√®re de la derni√®re ann√©e. Possible conflit d‚Äôint√©r√™t ? Le champ de l‚Äôenqu√™te aurait √©t√© ensuite √©largi √† un possible conflit d‚Äôint√©r√™t, Thierry Sol√®re, d√©put√© des Hauts-de-Seine, ayant √©t√© salari√© d‚Äôun groupe sp√©cialis√© dans le traitement des d√©chets, ajoute le Canard encha√Æn√©. thread.title: Trump, Abe discussed N. Korea missile launch at public dinner
thread.title_full: Trump, Abe discussed N. Korea missile launch at public dinner

posts.author: ADAM EDELMAN
posts.title: Trump, Abe discussed N. Korea missile launch at public dinner
posts.text:
Trump, Japan's premier discussed N. Korea missile launch at public diner table at Mar-a-Lago, surrounded by salads and documents Trump, Abe discussed N. Korea missile launch at public dinner President Trump dines with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe at Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach, Fla., Friday night, one evening before their bizarre public meeting about North Korea. (Susan Walsh/AP) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Monday, February 13, 2017, 1:11 PM 
President Trump's weekend get-together with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe included a bizarre scene Saturday night, following news of North Korea's ballistic missile test, that saw the two world leaders scramble to come up with an official response at a public dinner table at the commander-in-chief's Mar-a-Lago resort. 
The two men, who had spent most of the day golfing, were having dinner at an open-air public table at Trump's Mar-A-Lago estate in southern Florida when news of the launch broke, prompting them to cobble together a statement as aides brought documents to them and provided the light to read them with their personal cellphones, CNN reported. 
Trump received news of the strike on his cell phone while seated at the table, as dinner music played in the background, CNN reported, and as waiters took away plates of wedge salads and brought in the main course. 
According to CNN , numerous guests of the Florida club, in plain sight and earshot of Trump and Abe, began huddling near the table as the two leaders and other government officials, including National Security Adviser Michael Flynn and chief strategist Steve Bannon, got to work. 
How Trump is empowering the Saudi destruction of Yemen 
Aides held up their cell phones to provide lighting in the dimly-lit dining room - a potential breach of national security protocol due to the fact that personal cellphones could easily be hacked - so the leaders could see the documents.. 
Some guests continued to eat their meals amid the chaos, while others captured the unusual scene on their own cell phone cameras and posted the images to social media. 
"HOLY MOLY !! It was fascinating to watch the flurry of activity at dinner when the news came that North Korea had launched a missile in the direction of Japan," a Facebook user named Richard DeAgazio wrote Sunday along with pictures of Abe and Trump. 
"The Prime Minister Abe of Japan huddles with his staff and the President is on the phone with Washington DC. the two world leaders then conferred and then went into another room for hastily arranged press conference. Wow the center of the action!!!" he added. Mar-a-Lago member Richard DeAgazio personally saw and overheard President Trump‚Äôs conversation with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe. (Facebook) 
DeAgazio told The Washington Post in an interview Monday that he "saw things changing" after Trump took the initial call. 
"The prime minister's staff sort of surrounded him, and they had a little pow-wow," he said. 
"There wasn't any panicked look. Most of the people didn't even realize what was happening," DeAgazio told The Post. 
In another post Sunday, DeAgazio wrote about a man named "Rick," who he claimed was the security official who carries the emergency briefcase that the President uses to authorize a nuclear strike. 
How Trump is empowering the Saudi destruction of Yemen 
"This is Rick...He carries the 'football' The nuclear football (also known as the atomic football, the President's emergency satchel, the Presidential Emergency Satchel, the button, the black box, or just the football) is a briefcase, the contents of which are to be used by the President of the United States to authorize a nuclear attack while away from fixed command centers, such as the White House Situation Room," DeAgazio wrote. "It functions as a mobile hub in the strategic defense system of the United States. It is held by an aide-de-camp." 
DeAgazio has since deleted his Facebook account. 
As the open-air crisis meeting proceeded, First Lady Melania Trump and Abe's wife continued chatting with each other, through an interpreter, at the table, CNN reported. DeAgazio posted on Facebook that he even saw the man who follows Trump around with the briefcase containing the information on how to launch a nuclear strike. (Facebook) 
Moments later, Trump, Abe, and their aides moved from the dinner table toward a more private area inside a nearby ballroom. 
About 10 minutes later, around 10:30 p.m., they held a joint press conference, where Abe called the missile launch "absolutely intolerable," and where Trump said that "the United States of America stands behind Japan, its great ally, 100%." 
North Korea's ballistic missile test represented the first serious international incident of Trump's presidency. 
The missiles were fired off from the northwestern city of Kusong just before 8 a.m. and flew about 300 miles toward the Sea of Japan, according to U.S. and South Korean officials, before falling into the sea. 
State-run news agency KCNA said North Korean leader Kim-Jong Un personally supervised the test launch of the Pukguksong-2 - a new weapon described as a medium-to-long-range ballistic missile able to carry a nuclear warhead. 
On Monday, U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres strongly condemned the missile launch, ahead of an urgent meeting of the Security Council. 
Guterres called the launch ‚Äúa further troubling violation of Security Council resolutions‚Äù and urged North Korea to comply with its international obligations, U.N. deputy spokesman Farhan Haq said. Tags:

thread.title: ¬øPodr√° el esperado juego "For Honor" estar a la altura de las expectativas?
thread.title_full: ¬øPodr√° el esperado juego "For Honor" estar a la altura de las expectativas?

posts.author: Biobiochile - La Red De Prensa M S Grande De Chile.
posts.title: ¬øPodr√° el esperado juego "For Honor" estar a la altura de las expectativas?
posts.text:
¬øPodr√° el esperado juego "For Honor" estar a la altura de las expectativas? For Honor | Ubisoft Correcci√≥n o comentario enviar 
For Honor se acerca a pasos agigantados, un juego multi-jugador que en vez de darnos otro shooter aburrido promete una pelea entre templarios, vikingos y samur√°is. 
Una idea que no ha sido muy explorada, pero que le ha dado esperanza a los gamers que buscan algo m√°s interesante que los tipicos shooter modernos, ¬øPero podr√° estar a la altura de las expectativas del p√∫blico? 
Para los que no conocen este juego todav√≠a -lo que seria un peque√±o milagro con la cantidad de comerciales que hay en internet en este momento-, For Honor es un t√≠tulo multi-jugador creado por Ubisoft , en el cual tres facciones compuestas por caballeros templarios, vikingos y samur√°is intentan sobrevivir en un mundo que ha sufrido un cataclismo y ha empujado a estos guerreros a competir por los pocos recursos que todav√≠a quedan en el mundo. For Honor | Ubisoft 
Esa originalidad le ayuda mucho, ya que hay pocos juegos que tengan un estilo parecido. Lo m√°s cercano es Chivalry: Medieval Warfare , un juego desarrollado en 2010 que, como lo dice su nombre, se enfocaba en el combate medieval. 
√âsto hace que For Honor resalte por encima de otros t√≠tulos multi-jugador que son casi todos shooter modernos. 
Su estilo de juego se asemeja bastante al de los juegos de pelea, gracias a la cantidad de habilidades y combinaciones que puedes utilizar durante las batallas, pero logrado de tal manera que no puedes simplemente abusar de tus ataques. 
Nada de andar apretando botones al azar como lo har√≠a tu hermanito chico en Street Fighter, ac√° tienes que prestar atenci√≥n si quieres ganar. 
Los controles son extremadamente responsivos, al punto de que uno nunca siente que pierde por culpa de un juego mal hecho, sino porque los errores son exclusivamente tuyos (estamos seguros que de todas formas m√°s de uno los culpar√° igual). 
For Honor no solo tiene buena jugabilidad, sino tambi√©n un buen estilo art√≠stico y una gran calidad gr√°fica, la cual hace que todo se vea excelente en pantallas de alta definici√≥n. 
Pero no todo es perfecto, y For Honor tiene debilidades que podr√≠an causar problemas a la larga. For Honor | Ubisoft 
El primer problema, ir√≥nicamente, es tambi√©n su mayor fortaleza. No todos estar√°n interesados en el combate medieval que For Honor presenta, y no todos los que prueben este estilo podr√°n acostumbrarse. 
Es parecido a la situaci√≥n que ocurri√≥ con Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, este estilo de juego parece muy interesante y logra diferenciarlos, pero no retiene a mucha gente a la larga. Es una ‚Äúespada de doble filo‚Äù, a falta de mejor talla. 
√âsto no significa que el juego fallar√°, ya que puede mantener una comunidad de nicho, igual como lo han hecho muchos juegos de pelea y el mismo Chivalry: Medieval Warfare , al cual es casi inevitable compararlo. 
Pero una cantidad baja de jugadores podr√≠a ser un desastre para un juego que se basa completamente en la competencia entre usuarios. 
Si no logran mantener una cantidad decente de jugadores, habr√° menos posibilidad de crear nuevos contenidos para el juego, y con menos contenido, podr√≠a terminar muriendo r√°pidamente antes de que tenga la oportunidad de brillar. 
El segundo problema no es algo precisamente relacionado al juego, sino que a su compa√±√≠a desarrolladora, Ubisoft . Ellos son conocidos por crear t√≠tulos como Far Cry , Call of Juarez y Assassin‚Äôs Creed , pero su ultimo juego multi-jugador fue Rainbow Six: Siege , y √©ste justo nos puede mostrar cual podr√≠a ser su tal√≥n de Aquiles. Rainbow Six: Siege | Ubisoft 
Y es que Rainbow Six: Siege comenz√≥ siendo un absoluto desastre, pero gracias a los esfuerzos de Ubisoft se ha convertido en uno de los mejores shooter competitivos a la fecha. 
√âsto lo lograron agregando contenido nuevo, introduciendo mejoras constantes y ayudando a la comunidad, que es de nicho en comparaci√≥n con otros t√≠tulos. Pero sus servidores no han tenido la misma suerte. 
Los servidores de Rainbow Six: Siege se caen constantemente, y en el caso del servicio para sudam√©rica, es tan malo que muchos jugadores deben ‚Äúemigrar‚Äù hacia los servicios norteamericanos. Esto se debe a que Ubisoft todav√≠a no tiene mucha experiencia con t√≠tulos de este tipo. 
La comunidad sudamericana para Rainbow Six: Siege ha sufrido mucho debido a esto, teniendo bastantes quiebres y siendo dominada por Brasil, ya que el servidor del juego se encuentra en ese pa√≠s y por tanto tienen una experiencia un poco m√°s estable. 
Si eso ocurre con For Honor, podr√≠amos ver como la comunidad, que probablemente ya va a ser peque√±a en comparaci√≥n a otros juegos, se encoja a una cantidad √≠nfima debido a que la gente no pueda conectarse o simplemente se sienta frustrada con la falta de estabilidad. 
Pero si logran mantener un numero decente, la cantidad de contenido y soporte que Ubisoft puede entregar, ser√≠a lo justo y necesario para asegurarle un puesto como uno de los mejores juegos competitivos del 2017. 
¬øQue crees tu pasar√° con For Honor? ¬øCrees que podr√≠a ocurrir algo diferente? ¬øHas probado el juego? ¬°Dinos en los comentarios!

thread.title: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter

posts.author: Mia Galuppo
posts.title: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter
posts.text:
Sign up for our Newsletters . Daily Edition Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature 6:54 PM PST 2/13/2017 by Mia Galuppo Getty Images Annapurna Pictures has partnered with Susan and Robert Downey Jr.‚Äôs Team Downey for the untitled feature. 
Richard Linklater will direct Robert Downey Jr. in a real-life con man story. 
Annapurna Pictures has partnered with Susan and Robert Downey Jr.‚Äôs Team Downey for the untitled feature, which is based on the episode ‚ÄúMan of the People‚Äù from Gimlet Media‚Äôs Reply All podcast. 
The podcast tells the true story of Dr. John Brinkley, who scammed his way to fame and fortune using fake medicine, populism and the newest technology of the time: radio. Linklater will co-produce under his Detour Filmproduction banner, along with Gimlet Media‚Äôs PJ Vogt, Tim Howard, and Chris Giliberti. More to come.

thread.title: 'Kicked in the fangs': One Nation candidates furious over Liberal preference deal
thread.title_full: 'Kicked in the fangs': One Nation candidates furious over Liberal preference deal

posts.author: Claire Moodie
posts.title: 'Kicked in the fangs': One Nation candidates furious over Liberal preference deal
posts.text:
One Nation candidates in the WA election are threatening to disobey their own party on the controversial preference deal struck with the Liberal Party . Key points: One Nation candidates angry over Liberal preference deal Liberals to preference One Nation in Upper House, One Nation to preference Liberals in Lower House Individual candidates threatening to do their own 'how to vote' cards 
"I feel like I have just received a kick in the fangs by our own party," one candidate said in an email seen by 7.30. 
"The party is selling me and the constituents out." 
Now many of the party's candidates are openly defying the head office directive and threatening to give their own instructions of directing preferences. 
Dane Sorensen and David Miller are two candidates who were prepared to go on the record for 7.30. 
When they decided to run for One Nation in Western Australia, they did not expect to become bargaining chips. 
But that is what the pair, who come from opposite ends of the political spectrum, believe they have become under the controversial deal between Pauline Hanson's One Nation party and the WA Liberals. 
Under the deal, the Liberals will preference One Nation in all but one of the Upper House seats and in return will One Nation will preference the Liberals in all the lower house seats it is contesting. Photo: Dane Sorensen says the candidates should have been consulted about the preference deal. (ABC News: Claire Moodie) 
Mr Sorensen, a former mining executive, and Mr Miller, an electrical fitter and traditional Labor voter, are united in their opposition to the backroom deal. 
"I wasn't told ‚Äî I found out about it in the Sunday Times and reading social media," Mr Miller, candidate for the seat of Collie-Preston, told 7.30. 
"How it looks to me, [the deal] is to get people into the Upper House at the expense of people in the Lower House. 
"[I'm] less than impressed." 
Mr Sorensen, who is running in the seat of North West Central, says they should have been consulted. 
"People are perceiving that One Nation are purely trying to get the Liberal Party re-elected and that's not what I joined the party for and it's certainly not what I stand for," he said. Do you know more about this story? Email 'I will decide who I preference' 
A big point of contention for the Lower House One Nation candidates who are opposed to the deal is the fact that they are funding their own campaigns. 
Mr Sorensen estimates his will cost up to $15,000. The party has agreed to refund 75 per cent after the election. 
"I don't mind funding my own campaign as long as I'm not being dictated to as to how I will proceed with that campaign," he said. 
"Why would we preference, on a blanket basis, the party that has done an abysmal job of running the state?" 
In an email to other disgruntled One Nation candidates, Mr Sorensen said the One Nation party had provided total disorganisation and stupid directives. 
"We, the scum, are just cannon fodder. To say I'm not impressed, is an understatement," he said. 
"It amazes me that this 'party' expects us to all fund our own campaigns and then find out that they are manipulating us behind the scenes." 
Mr Sorensen then goes on to advise the other candidates to do their own "how to vote" cards, a sentiment endorsed by Mr Miller. 
"This deal is shambolic," he told other One Nation candidates in an email. 
"I, for one, will decide who I preference." 
Forty-five candidates are running for One Nation at the March 11 poll. 
The WA One Nation leader, Colin Tinknell, declined to be interview by 7.30 but, via, email, said that most candidates were happy with the preference deal.

thread.section_title: Alec Baldwin‚Äôs SNL Hosting Gig Brings Biggest Ratings in 6 Years ‚Äì Fortune
thread.title: Alec Baldwin‚Äôs SNL Hosting Gig Brings Biggest Ratings in 6 Years
thread.title_full: Alec Baldwin‚Äôs SNL Hosting Gig Brings Biggest Ratings in 6 Years

posts.author: Madeline Farber
posts.title: Alec Baldwin‚Äôs SNL Hosting Gig Brings Biggest Ratings in 6 Years
posts.text:
Alec Baldwin‚Äôs record-breaking 17th hosting gig on Saturday Night Live is raked in the ratings.
SNL brought in a 7.2 Nielsen overnight rating, CNN reports -- the show‚Äôs highest overnight rating since 2011. The last time the show saw a viewership that large was in 2010 when actress Betty White hosted and Jay-Z performed as the show‚Äôs musical guest, according to the Huffington Post .
This rating was also bigger than when President Trump hosted the show in 2015, which brought in an overnight rating of 6.6. At the time, it was the show‚Äôs best overnight rating since 2012, according to CNN.
The ratings are based on "Live + Same-Day" viewership -- those who either watched the broadcast live or within a same-night window, according to the Huffington Post.
Baldwin portrayed Trump in a sketch where he took three 9th-Circuit Court judges to The People‚Äôs Cour t over his controversial travel ban. Actress Melissa McCarthy also returned this week, again portraying White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer with angry, gum-chewing bully. And in a parody of the movie Fatal Attraction , Kate McKinnon portrayed Kellyanne Conway. Ed Sheeran was the musical guest for the night.
President Trump has repeatedly criticized SNL and Baldwin‚Äôs portrayal of him, saying in January that SNL is a ‚Äú failing show ‚Äù and that ‚ÄúAlec Baldwin‚Äôs a disaster.‚Äù

posts.title: Canal + arr√™te "Le Grand Journal": "Bref", le "SAV", "Bloqu√©s", ces programmes courts r√©v√©l√©s par l'√©mission
posts.text:
Canal + arr√™te "Le Grand Journal": "Bref", le "SAV", "Bloqu√©s", ces programmes courts r√©v√©l√©s par l'√©mission En douze ans, l'√©mission a fait √©merger de tr√®s nombreux talents, aujourd'hui connus et reconnus. 13/02/2017 12:40 CET | Actualis√© il y a 3 minutes La r√©daction du HuffPost NOUVEAU! SURLIGNE ET PARTAGE Surlignez la phrase que vous voulez partager sur Facebook et Twitter 
M√âDIAS ‚Äì C'est la fin d'une √©poque. Canal + a annonc√©, lundi 13 f√©vrier, la suppression de son √©mission culte "Le Grand Journal" . Et ce n'est pas une surprise, tant les audiences du programme avaient fortement baiss√© ces derniers mois, ne rassemblant plus que 0,6% d'audience moyenne - 124.000 t√©l√©spectateurs - alors qu'elle rassemblait encore 1,5 million de t√©l√©spectateurs en moyenne en 2012-2013. 
L'√©mission pr√©sent√©e par Michel Denisot , Antoine de Caunes, Ma√Øtena Biraben puis Victor Robert n'a pas r√©volutionn√© le paysage audiovisuel fran√ßais. Il s'agissait essentiellement d'un talk-show m√™lant divertissement, humour et actualit√©s, reprenant une partie des ingr√©dients qui avaient fait le succ√®s de sa "grande s≈ìur" Nulle part ailleurs . Mais elle a fait √©merger des formats originaux, des programmes courts devenus cultes, et des talents qui doivent beaucoup de leur carri√®re √† l'√©mission. Bref 
Parmi les programmes qui ont le plus marqu√© les esprits, on peut √©videmment citer "Bref". Diffus√©e de 2011 √† 2012, la mini-s√©rie cr√©√©e par Kyan Khojandi rencontre un √©norme succ√®s √† la t√©l√©vision, permettant au "Grand Journal" de battre son record d'audience avec 2,5 millions de t√©l√©spectateurs, mais aussi sur les r√©seaux sociaux: "Bref" devient un ph√©nom√®ne web et suscite des dizaines de parodies plus ou moins r√©ussies. Le SAV 
Toujours dans le registre humoristique, le "Service apr√®s-vente des √©missions" s'est aussi durablement install√© dans "le Grand Journal", apr√®s une saison dans 20h10 p√©tantes . Diffus√© entre 2006 et 2012, le "SAV" a permis de r√©v√©ler Fred Testot et surtout Omar Sy, C√©sar du meilleur acteur pour son r√¥le dans Intouchables (2012), qui a depuis d√©marr√© une carri√®re hollywoodienne. La Minute Blonde 
Programm√©e aux d√©buts du Grand Journal , entre 2004 et 2006, la "Minute blonde" de Fr√©d√©rique Bel fait aussi partie de ce type de programmes d√©cal√©s qui ont r√©v√©l√© de futurs acteurs et/ou humoristes √† la t√©l√©vision ou au cin√©ma. Le Petit Journal 
N'oublions pas, bien s√ªr Le Petit Journal , qui a pris son envol √† partir de 2011 en devenant une √©mission √† part enti√®re, alors qu'il s'agissait initialement d'une simple chronique pr√©sent√©e par Yann Barth√®s. En 2013, "Le Petit Journal " a encore pris du galon en √©tant diffus√© de 20h25 √† 20h55. L'√©mission a marqu√© les esprits par son ton, ses d√©cryptages de l'actualit√© (notamment politique) qui ne lui ont pas toujours fait que des amis et ses r√©v√©lations, notamment sur les fameuses "no-go-zones" de Fox News. Connasse 
Plus r√©cemment, "Connasse" avec Camille Cottin, diffus√©e en 2014 initialement dans "Le Before du Grand Journal " √©tait devenu un rendez-vous t√©l√©visuel phare l'espace de quelques mois. Depuis, la pastille est devenue un film, Dans le m√™me genre, on peut √©galement citer "Les Tutos", la mini-s√©rie de J√©r√¥me Niel venu du Studio Bagel. Bloqu√©s 
Dernier programme court marquant en date, "Bloqu√©s" de Kyan Khojandi , avec Orelsan et Gringe. En 2015 et ce pendant 121 √©pisodes, les deux rappeurs discutent sur leur canap√© "en attendant qu'il se passe quelque chose." Le leitmotiv? "En attendant qu'il se passe quelque chose, ils ont d√©cid√© de ne rien faire." Et la s√©rie fonctionne, elle devient le seul v√©ritable rendez-vous d'un Grand Journal d√©j√† moribond.

thread.title: Lahore blast: several killed as 'suicide bomb' hits Pakistan rally
thread.title_full: Lahore blast: several killed as 'suicide bomb' hits Pakistan rally

posts.author: Reuters in Lahore
posts.title: Lahore blast: several killed as 'suicide bomb' hits Pakistan rally
posts.text:
Reuters in Lahore   14.56 GMT 
A bomb has exploded during a protest near the provincial assembly in the Pakistani city of Lahore. 
Early reports said at least 10 people had been killed at dozens wounded. The protest had been organised by Pakistan‚Äôs pharmaceuticals industry. 
‚ÄúApparently it was a suicide blast but police are still investigating to know the exact nature of [it],‚Äù a Punjab police spokesman, Nayab Haider, said. 
A spokesman for Jamaat-ur-Ahrar, a faction of the Pakistani Taliban, called Reuters and claimed responsibility for the attack. Police and security officers cordon off the scene of the explosion in Lahore. Photograph: K.M. Chaudary/AP 
The group had also claimed responsibility for a blast last Easter in a park in Lahore that killed more than 70 people. 
Security in the country has improved in recent years but Islamist groups such as the Pakistani Taliban and Islamic State still pose a threat and have carried out mass attacks. 
The prime minister vowed the attacks would not weaken Pakistan‚Äôs resolve in fight against militancy. 
‚ÄúWe have fought this fight against the terrorists among us, and will continue to fight it until we liberate our people of this cancer, and avenge those who have laid down their lives for us,‚Äù Nawaz Sharif said.

thread.title: Hugh Jackman has a 6th skin cancer cut out from his nose | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Hugh Jackman has a 6th skin cancer cut out from his nose | Daily Mail Online

posts.author: Rachel Mcgrath
posts.title: Hugh Jackman has a 6th skin cancer cut out from his nose | Daily Mail Online
posts.text: Share 885 shares On the same day, Hugh was spotted walking his dogs in New York City, rugged up in layers against the chill. The actor sported a white beanie and ugg boots with a black puffer jacket over a jumper and sunglasses on his face. His bandages weren't visible from a distance, suggesting his outing was before the procedure. Doggy day care: On the same day, Hugh was spotted walking his dogs in New York City, rugged up in layers against the chill Pre-surgery? His bandages weren't visible from a distance suggesting his outing was before the procedure Meanwhile, on Sunday the handsome Australian actor fronted up to the cameras for a photo call for his final X-Men movie, Logan. Again, the star appeared sans bandage, suggesting he had the offending skin cancer removed on Monday itself. Wearing a grey suit with a navy polo T-Shirt underneath, the hunk smiled at the gathered press with salt and pepper stubble on display. All smiles: The star appeared sans bandage on Sunday as he promoted his last X-Men film, Logan, suggesting he had the offending skin cancer removed on Monday itself Debonair: Wearing a grey suit with a navy polo T-Shirt underneath, the hunk smiled at the gathered press with salt and pepper stubble on display Just earlier this month, Hugh announced he had a fifth skin cancer removed in an Instagram post. 'An example of what happens when you don't wear sunscreen. Basal Cell. 'The mildest form of cancer but serious, nonetheless,' he wrote alongside the photo. 'PLEASE USE SUNSCREEN and get regular check-ups,' he captioned the post. 'An example of what happens when you don't wear sunscreen. Basal Cell': Earlier this month the actor had his fifth skin cancer removed Last May, he revealed he'd had four skin cancers in 18 months and his doctor had warned him he would likely have more in the future. Just eight months after his fourth procedure, the medical prediction has proved to be well-founded. The 47-year-old first revealed he had some cancerous cells removed in November 2013. The first time was after a makeup artist noticed a little spot of blood on his nose while he was filming X Men: Days of Future Past and his wife Deborra-Lee Furness, 60, also urged him to get it checked out. Spotted by chance: The actor discovered his first skin cancer after a makeup artist noticed a little spot of blood on his nose while he was filming X Men: Days of Future Past and his wife Deborra-Lee Furness encouraged him to get it checked Hugh said the second time around he thought he just had a dark freckle but that, too, turned out to be cancerous. The third cancer was found after he noticed blood on his nose again. The actor has revealed he gets his skin checked every three months and during an interview to promote the 2014 X-Men movie, he said: 'I'm realistic about the future and it's more than likely that I'll have at least one more but probably many more, which is not uncommon for an Aussie particularly from English stock growing up in Australia where I don't remember ever being told to put sunscreen on.' He added that he is trying hard to stay positive about his health. 'The beauty of this is it's all preventable': He added that he is trying hard to stay positive about his health 'The beauty of this is it's all preventable. It's just about getting proper check-ups, he said. 'I can be a typical man, I couldn't be bothered, and now I'm not lazy at all.' Basal cell carcinoma is the most common form of skin cancer, and according to the American Cancer Society , the most common form of cancer in humans. It's a slow growing cancer and rarely spreads to other parts of the body. The ACF states that about half of those diagnosed with a basal cell skin cancer will develop a new skin cancer within five years. It develops on areas of the skin that are exposed to the sun, mainly on the face and neck. Common: According to the American Cancer Society Basal cell carcinomas are the most common form of cancer in humans - it's a slow growing cancer and rarely spreads to other parts of the body Share or comment on this article 885

thread.title: Hugh Jackman reveals another skin cancer treatment - CNN.com
thread.title_full: Hugh Jackman reveals another skin cancer treatment - CNN.com

posts.author: Dalila-Johari Paul, CNN
posts.title: Hugh Jackman reveals another skin cancer treatment - CNN.com
posts.text:
(CNN) Hugh Jackman's defense against skin cancer continues as the actor posted his latest warning Monday about wearing sunscreen. 
With a bandage over his nose, the star checked in with his fans on Twitter and Instagram to reveal that he's undergoing treatment for basal cell carcinoma, again. It's the most common form of skin cancer, but it is rarely fatal. "Another basal cell carcinoma. Thanks to frequent body checks and amazing doctors, all is well. Looks worse with the dressing on than off. I swear! #wearsunscreen" Another basal cell carcinoma. Thanks to frequent checks & amazing doctors, all's well. Looks worse w the dressing on then off! WEARSUNSCREEN pic.twitter.com/IA7N6Ca3Oe 
‚Äî Hugh Jackman (@RealHughJackman) February 13, 2017 The Australian actor has been treated for basal cell carcinoma at least four times. Last year , he posted a photo to his Facebook page with a similar image of a bandage over his nose. His treatment for basal cell carcinoma dates back to 2013. More than 8 in 10 of the 3.3 million Americans diagnosed with skin cancer each year have basal cell carcinoma, according to the American Cancer Society. Read More The diagnosis hasn't slowed the actor down. "Logan," the third installment in the X-Men franchise's Wolverine series is scheduled to open in movie theaters in March. He also stars as P.T. Barnum in the musical biopic, "The Greatest Showman on Earth," which is slated to open at the end of this year.

thread.title: Je Facebookprofiel is voor niemand veilig: deze scanner geeft alles bloot
thread.title_full: Je Facebookprofiel is voor niemand veilig: deze scanner geeft alles bloot

posts.author: Bieke Cornillie
posts.title: Je Facebookprofiel is voor niemand veilig: deze scanner geeft alles bloot
posts.text:
14/02/17 - 11u52 ¬© facebookscanner.com. Checken welke foto's van vrouwelijk schoon je lief heeft geliket op Facebook? Op zoek gaan naar de meest g√™nante beelden en statussen op het profiel van bekende politici? Of controleren wie alle jonge vrijgezellen in je buurt zijn? Wie dacht dat zijn Facebookprofiel er netjes voor beveiligd is, heeft het grondig fout. Met Facebookscanner.com , de nieuwe tool van ethisch hacker Inti De Ceukelaire, haal je de grootste stalker in jezelf naar boven. "Ik vond bijvoorbeeld grappige foto's van politici nog van voor ze bekend waren. Beelden die ze wellicht al lang verborgen hadden voor iedereen." Inti De Ceukelaire 
Het principe is simpel. T√© simpel eigenlijk. Wie op Facebookscanner.com iemands profiel invoert- dat van jezelf, van je lief, je ex of zelfs bekende politici of bekende Vlamingen- krijgt onmiddellijk een waslijst aan mogelijkheden. Foto's zien waarin die persoon getagd is - ook al is die niet eens je vriend op het sociale netwerk? Dat kan. Statussen, tot ver in het verleden? Ook mogelijk. Likes , reacties op foto's van anderen, plaatsen waar je bent geweest, noem maar op. "En het meest 'creepy' van allemaal: ook foto's, filmpjes, statussen... die je eerder verborgen had op je tijdslijn omdat je niet wilde dat anderen die te zien kregen, zijn in een handomdraai te bekijken. Zelfs geheime groepen waar je lid van bent, worden zomaar zichtbaar voor iedereen", vertelt ethisch hacker Inti De Ceukelaire. "Ik vond bijvoorbeeld grappige foto's van politici nog van voor ze bekend waren. Beelden die ze wellicht al lang verborgen hadden voor iedereen." Dashboard voor stalkers "Mensen staan er niet bij stil hoeveel info ze met √©√©n muisklik online te grabbel gooien." Inti De Ceukelaire 
Helemaal leuk wordt het als je de extra filters inzet. Wie voor Valentijn nog snel op zoek wil naar een date kan een kant en klaar lijstje met Facebookprofielen van pakweg alle single mannen onder de 30 te pakken krijgen. "Facebook is gewoon een datingsite, wie heeft nog Tinder nodig?", grapt Inti. En jaloerse vriendinnen die hun lief willen controleren, kunnen nagaan welke foto's van vrijgezelle vrouwen die de afgelopen maand heeft geliket. "Of je kan perfect zien wat je ex, waarmee je bijvoorbeeld al lang niet meer bevriend bent op het sociale netwerk, allemaal post en waar die uithangt. "Noem Facebookscanner.com gerust een dashboard voor stalkers, want dat is het echt." 
Slechte bedoelingen heeft De Ceukelaire allerminst. Integendeel. "Ik wil aantonen hoe gemakkelijk het is om aan de hand van data dingen te achterhalen. Hoe makkelijk 'likes' tegen je gebruikt kunnen worden. Mensen staan er niet bij stil hoeveel info ze met √©√©n muisklik online te grabbel gooien." "Zuckerberg kan niets tegen mij ondernemen" 
De ethische hacker baseert zich voor zijn website op Graph Search, een tool die Facebook in 2013 aanvankelijk voor iedereen lanceerde, maar al snel terug inperkte omwille van privacy problemen. "Nu blijkt eigenlijk dat die functie nooit verwijderd werd, maar gewoon goed verstopt zit. Niet bereikbaar voor gewone gebruikers weliswaar, w√©l door mensen die er wat van af weten. Mijn tool genereert voor elke situatie de juiste link en stuurt de gebruikers vervolgens door naar het juiste verborgen stukje Facebook. En dat is perfect legaal, Mark Zuckerberg kan niets tegen mij ondernemen." 
Voor wie er √©cht zeker van wil zijn dat zijn Facebookprofiel op slot en grendel zit voor mensen met slechte bedoelingen, is er maar √©√©n oplossing: effectief verwijderen wat het daglicht niet mag zien. "De optie 'verbergen op tijdlijn' aanklikken bij een foto is niet voldoende. Je moet hem ook echt verwijderen. Hetzelfde met tags. Verwijder je tag in een foto of vraag aan anderen om foute foto's van jou te wissen. En zet je vriendenlijst op priv√©, ook dat helpt. Kortom: alles wat er niet moet opstaan, gooi je er best meteen af."

posts.title: ‚ÄòThe View‚Äô Weighs In On ‚ÄòSNL‚Äô Kellyanne Conway Skit: ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs So Great‚Äô
posts.text:
TOP 5480103 
‚ÄúThe View‚Äù host Whoopi Goldberg said ‚ÄúGod bless SNL‚Äù after ‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù portrayed President Donald Trump‚Äôs advisor Kellyanne Conway as Glenn Close‚Äôs character from ‚ÄúFatal Attraction.‚Äù 
On Monday, the co-host of the talk show weighed in on the controversial ‚ÄúSNL‚Äù skit that many in the media labeled ‚Äúsexist.‚Äù The overridding opinion from Goldberg, Jedediah Bila, Sunny Hostin and Sarah Haines was that it was ‚Äúgreat.‚Äù (RELATED: The Women Of ‚ÄòThe View‚Äô Turn On Kellyanne Conway: You Sound ‚ÄòDelusional‚Äô) 
WATCH: 
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so good, ‚ÄúHostin responded after the show aired a clip of the skit. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs satire though, it‚Äôs supposed to be sort of pushing the bounds right. It‚Äôs supposed to make you uncomfortable.‚Äù (RELATED: Media Bubble Horrified As ‚ÄòSNL‚Äô Turns Jake Tapper‚Äôs Relationship With Kellyanne Conway Into A Violent, Sexual Mess) 
She then launched into disturbing quotes from the movie, before adding, ‚Äúbut seriously, I thought it was really, really well, well done.‚Äù 
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs really funny,‚Äù Bila added. ‚ÄúBetween this and Melissa McCarthy as Spicey [Sean Spicer] it is great. Look if SNL is picking on you, you‚Äôve arrived. So, any political figure out there you should be ‚Ä¶if it were me I would be loving it, and laughing at it. If you can‚Äôt laugh at yourself, you‚Äôve got a problem. It‚Äôs so great.‚Äù 
‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs a great thing‚Ä¶every president gets this,‚Äù Goldberg exclaimed. ‚ÄúNo one is immune. I think this is something that he [Trump]‚Ä¶.listen the more you fight it, the more fun it‚Äôs going to be to do it to you.‚Äù 
‚ÄúInquiring minds re: #SNL: @jaketapper & I spoke this morning just before brunch time. No boiling bunnies on the menu,‚Äù Conway tweeted in response to the SNL skit. Inquiring minds re: #SNL : @jaketapper & I spoke this morning just before brunch time. No boiling bunnies on the menu.

thread.title: Tantangan dan Peluang e-Voting di Indonesia - Tekno Liputan6.com
thread.title_full: Tantangan dan Peluang e-Voting di Indonesia - Tekno Liputan6.com

posts.title: Tantangan dan Peluang e-Voting di Indonesia - Tekno Liputan6.com
posts.text:
OPINI: Big Data untuk Revolusi Industri Kesehatan Indonesia 
Bentuk pelanggaran yang kerap kali terjadi pada pemilihan umum di Indonesia salah satunya adalah praktik money politics , seperti kertas pemungutan suara yang dapat dilihat oleh pihak lain serta kotak pemungutan suara yang secara mudah dapat dipalsukan. 
Menurut hasil laporan analisis media oleh Indonesia Indicator selama periode 16 Maret hingga 7 Mei 2014, praktik money politics terjadi pada kegiatan Pemilihan Legislatif (Pileg) 2014 dan memiliki tingkat sorotan media paling besar yakni 52 persen. Praktik seperti ini sesungguhnya dapat dicegah dengan menggunakan solusi teknologi. 
Misalnya, memberikan nomor identitas elektronik yang hanya dapat digunakan satu kali dan tidak dapat digunakan oleh orang lain ketika melakukan e-Voting . Pemilih dapat menggunakan NIK pada e-KTP, atau ke depannya dapat menggunakan teknologi biometrik seperti pemindai sidik jari atau iris mata, yang lebih aman dan personal. Data ini beserta hasil pemilihan akan disimpan secara otomatis pada perangkat yang terhubung dengan komputasi awan, sehingga hasil pemilihan dapat diproses secara lebih cepat. 
Dalam sistem pemilihan umum konvensional, petugas perlu membuka kertas suara satu per satu dan perlu waktu cukup lama untuk penghitungan dari masing-masing TPS. Sementara, melalui e-Voting , data dari masing-masing TPS secara otomatis ditampung oleh peladen ( server ), sehingga kita dapat menghasilkan penghitungan data secara lebih cepat dan akurat, dan juga menghindari kesimpangsiuran data akibat hasil penghitungan cepat ( quick count ) yang dilakukan oleh lembaga survei yang berbeda-beda. 
Teknologi juga bisa membantu KPU saat mendeteksi adanya kecurangan-kecurangan selama terjadinya pemilihan. Salah satu teknologi yang sangat efektif di sini adalah teknologi machine learning yang bisa mengenali perilaku pemilih di setiap tempat di Indonesia, sehingga setiap penyimpangan dapat diketahui akurat. Machine learning bahkan bisa melangkah lebih jauh lagi dengan memprediksi siapa yang akan menang, meskipun perolehan suara belum selesai dihitung. 
Salah satu tantangan di dalam pemilihan umum adalah tidak kenalnya si pemilih dengan pasangan calon. Sering kali pemilih hanya mencoblos berdasarkan paras wajah di foto, tetapi bukan programnya. Di sini, e-Voting dengan menggunakan teknologi tablet bisa membantu memberikan informasi-informasi yang ingin diketahui oleh si pemilih pada saat-saat terakhir sebelum pemilih "mencoblos" secara digital. 
Pemilih juga bisa diberikan dua kali kesempatan untuk mengubah pilihan, meski sudah "mencoblos". "Mencoblos" di sini maksudnya adalah menentukan pilihan. Jika menggunakan teknologi tablet, mencoblos bisa dilakukan dengan menyentuh foto tokoh pilihan menggunakan jarinya, atau menekan tombol tertentu yang disediakan. 
Sistem e-Voting juga bisa efektif mengatasi money politics . Misalnya, Parpol X menjanjikan akan memberikan uang sekian rupiah asalkan si pemilih bisa menunjukkan foto tokoh X yang "dicoblos" dan ini dibuktikan dari foto di smartphone miliknya. e-Voting bisa dibuat supaya di bagian akhir tampil pilihan gambar apa yang ingin difoto untuk bukti si pemilih. Jadi, sangat mungkin bahwa si pemilih sebenarnya mencoblos calon"Y", tetapi meminta sistem e-Voting menampilkan calon "X", sehingga ketika difoto, yang tampil adalah "X". 
Tentunya sistem e-Voting ini memerlukan kesiapan matang dari sisi penyelenggara dan juga dari sisi masyarakat, selain juga dari sisi infrastruktur internetnya. Sumber daya manusianya pun memerlukan sosialisasi lebih matang dengan dibantu pelatihan menggunakan sistem e-Voting yang dijalankan melalui fasilitas komputasi awan. Dengan menggunakan komputasi awan, pelatihan bisa dijalankan dengan murah dan massal. 
Untuk selanjutnya, e-Voting bisa diterapkan secara bertahap. Misalnya, tahapan paling mudah adalah membuat solusi hibrida menggunakan sistem pemilihan dengan kertas, tetapi ditopang oleh penggunaan teknologi komputasi awan di bagian pemprosesannya. Untuk selanjutnya, perlahan-lahan semua proses yang terjadi di dalam pemilihan umum bisa menerapkan digitalisasi secara bertahap. 
Tahapan paling awal untuk solusi hibrida ini sebenarnya mulai bisa terlihat. Misalnya pada PILKADA DKI sekarang sudah ada perusahaan lokal membuat aplikasi bernama Mata Rakyat yang dipergunakan untuk mendorong transparansi saat pemilihan umum. Aplikasi berbasiskan komputasi awan ini dipergunakan untuk memantau proses penghitungan cepat pemilihan umum. 
Lewat aplikasi ini, masyarakat diharapkan lebih mudah terlibat di dalam pesta demokrasi, dan perlahan-lahan kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap teknologi akan meningkat. Seiring dengan peningkatan kepercayaan ini, kepercayaan terhadap sistem e-Voting juga makin meningkat. Dengan begitu, secara berangsur-angsur penerapan e-Voting pada setiap pemilihan umum akan makin menyeluruh dan dapat merealisasikan pemilihan umum yang transparan, cepat, efektif, dan murah biayanya. 
(Cas/Why) Pilkada DKI 2017 Agenda Pilkada DKI 2017 akan berlangsung pada Februari 2017 diikuti tiga calon gubernur Agus Yudhoyono, Anies Baswedan, dan Basuki T. Purnama

thread.title: Trmasta ≈†tajerka, ki zna zdaj tudi vzeti, kar ji je ponujeno

posts.author: Martin Pavƒçnik
posts.title: Trmasta ≈†tajerka, ki zna zdaj tudi vzeti, kar ji je ponujeno
posts.text:
Ponedeljek, 13. 2. 2017; 4.00 Deli z ostalimi: Portret svetovne prvakinje Ilke ≈†tuhec Trmasta ≈†tajerka, ki zna zdaj tudi vzeti, kar ji je ponujeno 
Termometer prika≈æe, kako vroƒç je ƒçlanek. Skupni se≈°tevek je kombinacija ≈°tevila klikov in komentarjev. 0,0 
O termometru 0 0 
Ko je Ilka ≈†tuhec pred devetimi leti postala mladinska svetovna prvakinja v smuku, so bila priƒçakovanja o podobnem podvigu tudi v ƒçlanski konkurenci povsem realna. A od takrat do nedelje, ko je v St. Moritzu resniƒçno stopila na najvi≈°jo stopniƒçko, je prehodila trnovo pot, ki jo je skupaj z mamo zaznamovala za celotno ≈æivljenje. 
Svetovna prvakinja Foto: Getty Images 
≈†e pred dvema mesecema in pol je bila Ilka ≈†tuhec smuƒçarka brez ene same uvrstitve na stopniƒçke za zmagovalke v svetovnega pokalu, brez kolajn na velikih tekmovanjih in z ≈æe dopolnjenimi 26 leti ≈æe lep ƒças neupraviƒçena do statusa tiste, katere najveƒçji zaveznik je ƒças. Njena generacija je namreƒç ≈æe veƒç let vladala smuƒçarski karavani, tudi s smuƒçarkami, ki jih je Ilka v mlaj≈°ih kategorijah gladko premagovala. 
Danes Ilka ≈†tuhec ni le najbolj≈°a slovenska smuƒçarka, temveƒç sve≈æa svetovna prvakinja v smuku, zmagovalka petih tekem svetovnega pokala in vodilna v smuka≈°kem se≈°tevku svetovnega pokala z odprto potjo do malega kristalnega globusa, ki ga v Slovenijo v najhitrej≈°i disciplini ni prinesel ≈°e noben smuƒçar. 
Ona je verjela. Ona je vedela. 
"Vedno sem verjela," na rezultatski zasuk z zanjo znaƒçilnim skomigom z rameni, ki ga kot po pravilu dopolni z mladostni≈°kim hihitanjem, od katerega se tudi po slovesu od najstni≈°kih let ni loƒçila, odgovarja ≈†tajerka. A ƒçeprav njeni javni nastopi nemalokrat vkljuƒçujejo kopico stalnih besednih zvez in kratkih ter priƒçakovanih odgovorov, bli≈æje resnici v tem primeru ne bi mogla biti. 
Veƒç kot le mati in hƒçi. 
Le oseba, ki verjame o dosegljivosti najvi≈°je zastavljenih ciljev, je namreƒç sposobna in zmo≈æna tolikokrat stisniti zobe ali pa se podati po krepko dalj≈°i poti. Ilka je to v dru≈æbi mame Darje ƒårno morala storila veƒçkrat, zato je njuno zadovoljstvo v zadnjih tednih ≈°e toliko bolj razumljivo. 
Boleƒçina, odrekanja ‚Ä¶ 
Do trenutka, ki je dodobra upoƒçasnil Ilkin meteorski vzpon, je po uspehih v mlaj≈°ih kategorijah in prvih toƒçkah v svetovnem pokalu pri≈°lo poleti leta 2008 na treningih v ƒåilu. "Ne bi smela tja. Bila sem proti," se spominja mama Darja. A je ≈°la in se po padcu vrnila s hudo po≈°kodovanim kolenom. Za nameƒçek je na poti vraƒçanja ≈†tuhƒçeva ostala brez reprezentanƒçne podpore, poleg tega pa so se zdravstvene te≈æave kljub nekaj rezultatskim vzponom ≈°e ponavljale. 
Mama Darja je v najte≈æjih trenutkih, daleƒç od oƒçi javnosti, ki je tedaj pozornost namenjala predvsem nizanju uspehov Tine Maze , ≈æe pomislila, da vse skupaj nima pravega smisla. Da bi bilo bolje odnehati. A ker je ƒçutila Ilkino neizmerno ≈æeljo, podkrepljeno s ≈°tajersko trmo, je hƒçerki sledila. Za to so bila potrebna ≈°tevilna odrekanja, zadol≈æevanja ‚Ä¶ Vse v upanju, da bo pri≈°el dan, ko bo vse poplaƒçano. 
Nasmiha se ji dvojna smuka≈°ka krona: zlata kolajna na SP in mali globus. Foto: Guliver/Getty Images 
≈†ampionska sestavljanka 
Z ≈æelezno voljo in dru≈æinsko iznajdljivostjo se je sicer Ilka prebila do visoke mednarodne ravni, a medtem ko so njene vrstnice ≈æe zaƒçele posegati po najvi≈°jih mestih, ona ni na≈°la vzvoda za zadnji preboj. Vse do pretekle sezone, v kateri jo je skorajda popolna reprezentanƒçna preusmeritev v slalom in veleslalom prisilila v odcepitev. 
Navdih je na≈°la v samostojni ekipi, z mamo v vlogi serviserke in vodje, trenerjem Gregorjem Ko≈°tomajem , ki je po veƒç letih v Bolgariji iskal domaƒçi izziv, in prijateljico iz otro≈°kih let ter diplomirano kineziologinjo Anjo ≈†e≈°um , s katero sta hitro na≈°li skupni jezik. 
Vrnitev odpisane 
Na preboj, s katerim bi la≈æje plaƒçevala tudi denarne dolgove, je sama pri sebi upala ≈æe v pretekli zimi, a se je, kot je pozneje priznala, preveƒç ubadala z nujnostjo uspeha. Sezono napredka je tako sprejela kot dobro osnovo, zamenjala opremljevalca smuƒçi ter se ob pomoƒçi mo≈°ke reprezentance lotila svojih najbolj dovr≈°enih priprav. 
"Vra≈æje hitra je," so nam ≈æe poleti namigovali smukaƒçi. Potrditev je pri≈°la ≈æe na prvi smuka≈°ki tekmi sezone, ki jo je konƒçala na najvi≈°ji stopniƒçki. Dan zatem je z drugo zmago potrdila, da ≈°e zdaleƒç ne gre za muho enodnevnico, v podobnem slogu pa nato nadaljevala tudi v Evropi. 
21. kolajna za slovensko smuƒçanje. Foto: Getty Images 
Zdaj vzame, kar ji je ponujeno 
Na svetovnem prvenstvu v St. Moritzu je Ilka dokazala tudi, da se je sposobna spopadati z najveƒçjimi pritiski ter se hitro pobirati po spodrsljajih. Pred smukom je namreƒç kljub kombinacijskem odstopu in superveleslalomskem odmiku od najvi≈°jih mest, kjer se je ujela v zanko tehniƒçne zahtevnosti, veljala za absolutno prvo favoritinjo, tako moƒçno, da je bila sama sebi najveƒçja tekmica. Izzivu je bila kos. 
S tem se je dokonƒçno otresla vloge "veƒçne nekdanje mladinske prvakinje", ki zna zobe pokazati le na doloƒçenih terenih in v napadih iz ozadja. Zdaj tudi v oƒçeh najbolj zahtevne strokovne javnosti velja za prefinjeno smuka≈°ko drsalko s ƒçarobno mehkobo v kolenih, za fiziƒçno ƒçvrsto smuƒçarko in predvsem neustra≈°no napadalko, ki zna vzeti, kar ji je ponujeno. thread.title: 5th grade coed team was asked to kick the girls out, so they forfeited their season instead
thread.title_full: 5th grade coed team was asked to kick the girls out, so they forfeited their season instead

posts.author: Kofie Yeboah
posts.title: 5th grade coed team was asked to kick the girls out, so they forfeited their season instead
posts.text:
Now that‚Äôs a true team.
We all know that ‚ÄúBall is Life,‚Äù but sometimes life tries to interfere with ball.
According to a story on NJ.com , a team of nine boys and two girls forfeited the rest of their season after the league‚Äôs director said that the girls would no longer be allowed to play on the team.
The 5th Grade St. John‚Äôs CYO basketball team, which already had years of experience playing together, now faced a conundrum. 
Drop the girls and keep playing? Or forfeit the remainder of the season?
The parents asked the kids. 
"Is your decision to play the game without the two young ladies on the team, or do you want to stay as a team as you have all year?" asked parent Matthew Dohn. "Show of hands for play as a team?"
Eleven hands shot up in unison. No one raised a hand when asked the alternative.
It's good to know kids still do the right thing and support each other https://t.co/9aZRYOlA4g 
‚Äî Duane (@duanezapain) February 12, 2017 This can't get RT'ed enough. There is a whole lot of good in us still. So impressed by these 5th graders. https://t.co/HejNummjYw 
‚Äî Todd Kalinosky (@tkgoblue) February 12, 2017 While the other team left the gym, St. John‚Äôs decided to play anyway. They split up their 11-person team and decided to have a game of their own.
Through the hurdles and obstacles that people try to throw at you, Ball is Life.

thread.title: El gran misterio de Albert Einstein est√° a punto de resolverse
thread.title_full: El gran misterio de Albert Einstein est√° a punto de resolverse

posts.author: RT en espa√±ol
posts.title: El gran misterio de Albert Einstein est√° a punto de resolverse
posts.text:
El gran misterio de Albert Einstein est√° a punto de resolverse Publicado: 14 feb 2017 00:28 GMT 
Una investigaci√≥n de cient√≠ficos escoceses puede tener dos desenlaces, cada uno de los cuales cambiar√° de manera fundamental nuestra comprensi√≥n del espacio y revelar si existe o no la energ√≠a oscura. dpa / Stefan Puchner www.globallookpress.com Este animal podr√≠a sobrevivir un apocalipsis 
Un grupo de astr√≥nomos est√° intentando demostrar una idea formulada por Albert Einstein hace un siglo para resolver el rompecabezas de la expansi√≥n acelerada del universo . Los c√°lculos de una nueva investigaci√≥n de acad√©micos de la Universidad de Edimburgo, en el Reino Unido, publicada en la revista ' Physics Letters B ', podr√≠an explicar si la responsable de esa expansi√≥n es la energ√≠a oscura, como estipula la teor√≠a de Einstein de la relatividad general, o la teor√≠a de la gravedad. 
En los a√±os 1990 los astr√≥nomos descubrieron que las galaxias como nuestra V√≠a L√°ctea se desplazan a una velocidad muy alta, recuerda el diario ' The Independent '. Les sorprendi√≥ tambi√©n descubrir que esta velocidad se aceleraba. Decidieron que una fuerza desconocida y misteriosa, la energ√≠a oscura, era la causa de este raro comportamiento. 
Hace un siglo Albert Einstein us√≥ un concepto similar en sus estudios e introdujo un elemento matem√°tico conocido como la 'constante cosmol√≥gica' para explicar un universo est√°tico, pero descart√≥ su factor matem√°tico como un error despu√©s de que se descubriera que nuestro universo est√° en expansi√≥n. Pero existe otra posibilidad seg√∫n la cual en las distancias intergal√°cticas la gravedad no funciona como se supone que deber√≠a hacerlo. 
Los cient√≠ficos de la Universidad de Edimburgo creen que este rompecabezas se puede resolver midiendo la velocidad a la que las ondas de gravitaci√≥n cruzan el universo . Sus c√°lculos muestran que si las ondas de gravitaci√≥n se mueven a la velocidad de la luz eso descartar√≠a teor√≠as alternativas de la gravedad que excluyen la energ√≠a oscura. Por otro lado, si su velocidad es distinta a la de la luz, la teor√≠a de la energ√≠a oscura deber√≠a ser revisada. 
Tal experimento podr√≠a ser llevado a cabo en el Observatorio de Ondas Gravitacionales con Interfer√≥metro L√°ser (LIGO, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) en EE.UU., que detect√≥ directamente ondas gravitacionales por primera vez en 2015. "La reciente detecci√≥n directa de ondas gravitacionales ha abierto una nueva ventana de observaci√≥n a nuestro universo. Nuestros resultados muestran c√≥mo esto nos guiar√° para resolver uno de los problemas m√°s fundamentales de la f√≠sica", asegura Lucas Lombriser, de la Universidad de Edimburgo.

thread.title: Cewek ini dibekuk polisi usai ajak 2 bocah ngeseks di toilet umum

posts.title: Cewek ini dibekuk polisi usai ajak 2 bocah ngeseks di toilet umum
posts.text:
Cewek ini dibekuk polisi usai ajak 2 bocah ngeseks di toilet umum   15:54 Reporter : Yulistyo Pratomo Ilustrasi Pasangan Mesum. ¬©2015 Merdeka.com 
Merdeka.com - Seorang wanita dibekuk polisi dengan tuduhan melakukan hubungan seksual dengan bocah berusia 12 dan 14 tahun di toilet umum dan merekamnya. Di seluruh dunia, termasuk Indonesia, melakukan aktivitas seks dengan anak di bawah umur merupakan pelanggaran hukum dan pelakunya bisa dijebloskan ke penjara.Dilansir mirror.co.uk, Senin (13/2), wanita tersebut diketahui bernama Maria Lynn Baker. Dia dicokok aparat kepolisian Florida Sabtu (11/2) kemarin dan dikenai dua jeratan hukum, yakni pencabulan dan perbuatan mesum.Petugas dari Departemen Kepolisian Ocala (OPD) dihubungi seorang wanita untuk menunjukkan bukti tindakan Maria yang meniduri bocah di bawah umur. Usai menerima laporan itu, Detektif Melissa Buetti langsung bertindak dan menyeret pelakunya ke jeruji besi."Kejadian itu berlangsung di salah satu toilet War Memorial, Silver Springs Boulevard," mengutip keterangan resmi dari petugas OPD.Polisi juga menyebutkan, pelaku bisa saja dikenakan jeratan tambahan mengingat masih ada korban lain yang belum terungkap. thread.title: Chelsea fans blame one player for their 1-1 draw with Burnley | GiveMeSport
thread.title_full: Chelsea fans blame one player for their 1-1 draw with Burnley | GiveMeSport

posts.title: Chelsea fans blame one player for their 1-1 draw with Burnley | GiveMeSport
posts.text:
Chelsea fans blame one player for their 1-1 draw with Burnley Published 24/7 
Chelsea's lead at the top of the Premier League now stands at 10 points after their draw with Burnley. 
Antonio Conte was handed a massive boost before his team had even played after watching Tottenham lose 2-0 at Liverpool, but the Blues weren't able to capitalise as they would have liked. 
Pedro got proceedings underway with a well-taken goal just seven minutes in before Robbie Brady's superb free-kick levelled things up. Article continues below 
And, as the scoreline would suggest, Chelsea just weren't at their best. 
Turf Moor is never an easy place to go, and that certainly showed. Article continues below Video: Lee Dixon accused of racism whilst commentating on Liverpool vs Spurs 
Nonetheless, there wasn't an awful lot Conte's men could have done differently. David Luiz was impressive despite seemingly playing with an injury, and N'Golo Kante was his typically unstoppable self. 
There should perhaps be a little concern over Diego Costa, whose goal drought - if we can call it that - stands at three games. The striker hasn't even had a shot on target for over 190 minutes, and man-of-the-match Michael Keane made sure that wasn't about to change against Burnley. 
Yet, Costa escaped the wrath of Chelsea fans on social media. Perhaps it's because he's their top scorer, or maybe it's just that they're delighted to have him back after his spat with Conte in January. 
Either way, it was Nemanja Matic who was being targeted. 
The Serbia international is in a difficult position at the club - he's vying for the same spot as Cesc Fabregas, which means he's always going to be under heavy scrutiny. Matic made a big mistake 
The 28-year-old is also playing alongside Kante, so it's difficult for him to shine at the expense of his brilliant midfield partner. 
All the Chelsea fans were asking for, though, were a few decent tackles and maybe one or two key passes going forward. They didn't get them, and here's how they vented their frustration: 
Conte may well come under pressure to pick Fabregas instead next week, but fortunately for Matic, even dropping two points at Burnley isn't likely to have damaged Chelsea's title chances at all. 
Should Fabregas be starting for Chelsea instead of Matic? Have your say in the comments.
